attributes.additional_details: I’d like you to stop lying mainly because we pay your wages and you were voted in to do things in the best interests of the citizens of this country, not to look out for yourselves and your mates.
attributes.background: In 2020 more than any other year you have lied, lied and lied again! Sometimes just when it looks like you might be about to tell a small truth, you instead decide to just lie. How about you just stop it?
